goal.en: "Study the science of sound including its production, transmission and effects."
goal.ch: 研究聲音的產生、傳導與其他效應。

content.en:
"CONTENTS :
1. Introduction
2. Vibration and Wave Propagation
3. Acoustic Wave Equation
4. Transmission of Sound
5. Sound Sources and Radiation of Sound
6. Duct Acoustics
7. Room Acoustics
8. Acoustic-Structural Interactions
9. Measurements (optional topic)"
content.ch:
"CONTENTS :
1. Introduction
2. Vibration and Wave Propagation
3. Acoustic Wave Equation
4. Transmission of Sound
5. Sound Sources and Radiation of Sound
6. Duct Acoustics
7. Room Acoustics
8. Acoustic-Structural Interactions
9. Measurements (optional topic)"

textbook.en: "Text: Kinsler, Frey, Coppens & Sanders, Fundamentals of Acoustics, John Wiley & Sons."
textbook.ch: "Text: Kinsler, Frey, Coppens & Sanders, Fundamentals of Acoustics, John Wiley & Sons."

en.Assessments: Test/Exam ， Assignments ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Attendance/Performance ， Self Assessment/ Peer Assessment
Test/Exam ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper)

en.competency: Design / Development of Solution and Investigation
en.Assessments: Test/Exam ， Assignments ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper)
Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Attendance/Performance
